Posts.Content: kim0712 wrote: Hello everyone I just finished the 12 taxol treatments on Tuesday and am waiting to see my BS on Dec. 12 about a mastectomy. For the last few days I have been having a little ache on my right side and it seems to be inflamed. I made an appt to see my dr but it's not until Monday. I am worrying myself crazy thinking it spread any thoughts would be helpful. Dx 4/26/2011, IDC, 1cm, Stage IIB, Grade 3, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lil ache on right side kim0712 melster

Posts.Content: May 12, 2011 09:50AM kim0712 wrote: Hello my name is Kim and I was diagnosed on 4/26/11 and am stage 1. I am scheduled for lumpectomy surgery on 5/16/11 with SNB and possible axillary dissection. I am a little nervous but I am glad we have this site to help us to cope. I trust and believe that God will bring us through it. I realize that the sun shines even when it rains. SMILE!!!
Posts.Title: CALLING ALL STAGE I SISTERS sheila888 MCBaker
